info.name: Firefox - Remove Identity Box
info.description:
If you want to remove it, here's a solution.  

Adjust padding in code to set spacing between URL text and the box's edge.
info.additionalInfo:
To show http protocol - enter about:config in the address bar, search for browser.urlbar.trimURLs and set value to false https SSL secure connection status verified earth identity globe icon box URL location bar remove hide 2015-03-18
  • Use em units for padding instead of px.
